idea: DoMyRepair provides facility management services for retail, commercial, industrial and corporate customers. Our target customers are from both institutional, government, public and private sectors. We provide technical services like maintenance and repair of home appliances like air-conditioners, microwave, water purifier, television sets, refrigerator, washing machine across brands and non-technical services like deep home cleaning, general housekeeping etc. We plan to expand our portfolio of services in both technical and non-technical areas across the country and build DoMyRepair as a mega service brand for top quality and reliable service. We also have global aspirations.
name: DoMyRepair
